title: debug no-optimize make check yields three failures
body:
This is on a Mac OS X machine.

```
CFG_CONFIGURE_ARGS   := --enable-debug --disable-optimize --enable-ccache --enable-clang --prefix=~/opt/rust-dbg-nopt
```

```
% make check
...
```

issue-2216.rs:

```
...
test [run-pass] run-pass/issue-1701.rs ... ok

error: compilation failed!
command: x86_64-apple-darwin/stage2/bin/rustc /Users/pnkfelix/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/test/run-pass/issue-2216.rs -o x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass/issue-2216.stage2-x86_64-apple-darwin -L x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass -L x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass/issue-2216.stage2-x86_64-apple-darwin.libaux -O --target=x86_64-apple-darwin
stdout:
------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------
stderr:
------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------

task <unnamed> failed at 'explicit failure', /Users/pnkfelix/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/compiletest/runtest.rs:778
...
```

issue-9047.rs:

```
...
test [run-pass] run-pass/issue-868.rs ... ok

error: compilation failed!
command: x86_64-apple-darwin/stage2/bin/rustc /Users/pnkfelix/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/test/run-pass/issue-9047.rs -o x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass/issue-9047.stage2-x86_64-apple-darwin -L x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass -L x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass/issue-9047.stage2-x86_64-apple-darwin.libaux -O --target=x86_64-apple-darwin
stdout:
------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------
stderr:
------------------------------------------

------------------------------------------

task <unnamed> failed at 'explicit failure', /Users/pnkfelix/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/compiletest/runtest.rs:778
...
```

labeled-break.rs:

```
...
test [run-pass] run-pass/issue2378c.rs ... ok

error: compilation failed!
command: x86_64-apple-darwin/stage2/bin/rustc /Users/pnkfelix/Dev/Mozilla/rust.git/src/test/run-pass/labeled-break.rs -o x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass/labeled-break.stage2-x86_64-apple-darwin -L x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass -L x86_64-apple-darwin/test/run-pass/labeled-break.stage2-x86_64-apple-darwin.libaux -O --target=x86_64-apple-darwin
```
